text: Rayford Cooks (born August 25, 1962) is a former American football defensive end. He played for the Houston Oilers in 1987. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:American football defensive ends Category:North Texas Mean Green football players Category:Houston Gamblers players Category:Montreal Alouettes players Category:Houston Oilers players Category:BC Lions players Category:National Football League replacement players
title: Rayford Cooks
